data.actual_result: It's blurple. Make up your mind. You can't be blurple and black.
data.expected_result: The verified hover thing is black like every other thing because consistency is key™
data.short_description: The verified hover things are blurple, but all the other hover things are black
data.steps_to_repro: - Get the most recent build (verified update) - Go to a verified server (official servers) - Hover over the verified icon
